name: Win This Day!
flavor: You inspire your allies to recover and gather their strength.
target: Self and each ally in the area

metadata.flavor: You inspire your allies to recover and gather their strength.
metadata.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target gains 2 surges. Additionally, they can spend a Recovery, remove any conditions or effects on them, and stand up if they are prone.
